original_title: Talk of the Town | Election Promises | Rohana Hettiarachchi
original_body_lines: The chieftain or the main ‘kapu mahatha’ of the Kataragama Maha Devalaya, arrested by the Colombo Crimes Division.
Kudu Roshan and others were arrested by the ‘Yukthiya’ operation
